<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.IsMonitored</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>IsMonitored</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var IsMonitored = Class.create();

IsMonitored.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getMonitoredTables: function getMonitoredTables() {
		gs.log("runs........................");
	var ans = [];
	var grMonitor = new GlideRecord('u_integration_monitor');
	grMonitor.query();
	while (grMonitor.next()){
		ans.push(grMonitor.u_table_name.toString());
	}
	return ans;
},
	type: 'IsMonitored'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>

        <sys_policy/>
